channel.title: CVE Feed for supsysticcom -- Digital Publications by Supsystic
channel.description: The latest CVEs for supsysticcom -- Digital Publications by Supsystic

item.title: CVE-2023-5756|2024-08-02T08:07:32.758Z -- supsysticcom -- digital%20publications%20by%20supsystic
item.description: The Digital Publications by Supsystic plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 1.7.6. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the AJAX action handler. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to execute AJAX actions via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
